unnormalised: Boreponno lokanno, amkam Integral Calculus vixim uloium! Mhaka khobor asa, tumcheantlea zaiteam zannank, tem rong sukhtana polletat titlem boreponnachem aikota. Punn mhojeacher visvas dovrat, ekdam tumkam tachi vollokh zali, zalear tem ek mahashakti ugddapeakhatir asta. Tumchea gonitachea zageant tem ek uch’ch problem-solving upkoronn mhunn chintat. Hea postacho hetu thoddo bhiranticho kel’lo asa, thoddo odhik laginchos kel’lo asa, khas korun mhojea desi lokank jea kathin porikxeakhatir toyar zatat.
normalised: Barobar asa bhava-bhaginiंनो, ammi integral calculus vixim uloiam! Mhaka khobor asa, tumchea zannteponak lagun, tem doriaveller rong sukovop pollevop itlench boreponn dista. Punn mhozo visvas asa, tumi zai tem melltoch, tem ek shakti ugoddavop porim asta. Tem tumchea ganitanche samogrint ek ut'tom somossia somadhanacho upai mhunn chintat. Hi post thodi odik bhennkuk nasta korunk, thodi odik odhik olkhichem korunk kel'lem asa, khas korun mojim deshi lokam tankam kothin porixenk vostu korpache vostu melltta.

unnormalised: Tor, exact integral calculus *kiteak* asa? Sadea utrant sangtat zalear, tem differentiation-achi ultti prokruti asa. Derivative kaddop tumkam ugddas asa? Eka ekloch binducher eka curve-acho slope sodun kaddop? Tor, integration tea curve-ache *tolla* area sodunk sangta. Chintat tumi reservoirant kitlem udok voita tem calculate kortat – integral calculus tem korunk modot korunk xakta! Tem sogllem vostu ektthaim koropachem asa, ek zago mellovpakhatir anant lahan tukdde add kortat. Chintat tumi 5 kg boriantlea sogllea rice-achea dhanyachea tukddeanche addition kortat mhunn.
normalised: Mhunn, integral calculus exactly kitem asa? Sodik sangop mhunnlear, tem differentiation-achem ulttem prokria asa. Derivatives ghetana tumkam yaad asa? Ekuch point-ar ek curve-ichi slope sodunk? Mhunn, integration mhunnlear tea curve-akhalichi zago sodunk asa. Dhyaan di tumi kitlem udok ek reserivoir-ant vahoita tem hesap kortana – integral calculus tem korunk madat korunk xokta! Tem sogllim vostu ekttaim korunk, anant lahan stukddea ekuch zago ghetlolea pasun melltop asa. Pach kilo bag-intlim sogllim tandllanchim stukddea melltolea porim chintat.

unnormalised: Atam, fancy chinnam ani formula dekhun bhirant bhogonaakat. Tem lambayel’lem “S” chinn, ∫, tem integral chinn asa. Tea chinnachea sokla tumkam thodde limits melltolim zoxe, say, 0 te 5 (∫₀⁵ mhunn boroil’lem), hacho orth ami x = 0 ani x = 5 hache modem curve-acho area calculate kortat. Him limits mahatvachim, tumchea calculation-akhatir maryada nixchit kortat. Henche bhair tumkam ek general formula mellta - ek antiderivative jechea xevottak “+ C” marunk poddta (∫f(x)dx = F(x) + C). Hem C, integration-achem constant, mahatvachem disonaastana dista, punn tem visronaakat - tem tumchea zobabak vhodd forok korunk xakta.
normalised: Atam, fancy symbols ani formulas-ak bhivonk naka. Tea vhoddlea "S" symbol, integral chinha, integral chinha asa. Tea symbol-acha khal tumkam kaim limits mellonk xoktat, kiteak mhunnlear, zerok pasun panch (zero pasun panch mhunn boroilear), hem mhunnlear ammi x equals zero ani x equals five-ache modlem curve-akhalichem zago hesap kortam. He limits mahatvache asat, tumchea hesapank boddi ghalunk. He naxilear, tumi ek sadharan formula-ant sampoddttole - ek antiderivative jichea antak “plus C” marpacheo asa (integral of f of x d x equals F of x plus C). Ho C, constant of integration, mahatvacho naxil'lo dista, punn tem visrunk naka - tem tumchea zobabak ek vhoddlem bodol haddunk xokta.

unnormalised: Ek samanyo application? Irregular shape-anchem area calculate korop. Tim boreponnachim rectangles ani circles tumi schoolant shiklolim tim visrat. Integral calculus tumkam practically kitem-ui area sodunk dita! Seriously, tumchi auy ji odd shape-achi samosa korta ti, hypothetically, "integrate" korunk zateli. Okay, zaite pavtti practically na, punn tumkam idea mellta. Tech technique-an 3D shape-anchem volume sodunk modot korta - area ani volume design engineers-ank eka building project-ak yoznni korpakhatir khub mahatvachim concepts asat, mhunn sangunk zata.
normalised: Ek sadharan application? Aniyomit akarache zago hesap korunk. School-ant tumi xiklolea boreponn naxil'lim rectangles ani circles visrat. Integral calculus tumkam practical rupant kitem-i zago sodunk dita! Gambhir rupant, tumchi ammam korunk sadar samosa-ikui, hypothetically, "integrate" korunk xokta. Okay, khorench naxil'lem zata, punn tumkam idea melltta. Hi technique tin D akarache volumes sodunkui upyukt asa - zago ani volumes he design engineers-achea vostunt vostu asat, kiteak mhunnlear tim ek building project-achem yojana kortat.

unnormalised: Applications-acher ulovpak vetanant, motion-acho vichar korat! Physics class ugddas asa? Ek object-achi velocity dilear integration tanko kitlem antar cholo tem calculate korpak modot korta. Eka khas vellantle ek car 0 kmph thavn 60 kmph-ak accelerate zata mhunn dhorat. Velocity function-ak integrate korun, ami tharavik zata tanko acceleration-ache vellar carn kitlem antar cholo tem sodun kaddunk xaktat. Dhorat data tem kiteak tari disunk lagta, v(t) = 1.2 * t^2 m/s. Ami tem t = 0 s thavn t = 10 s (∫₀¹⁰ 1.2t² dt) hem integrate kortat zalear, ami displacement sodtolim.
normalised: Applications vixim uloitana, motion-ak vicharat! Tumkam physics class yaad asa? Integration ek vastu duren kel'lim distance hesap korunk madat korta jem tiche velocity dita. Dhyaan di ek car zero kilometer prati hour pasun sixty kilometer prati hour-ak ek tharavik velar uchlleop korta. Velocity function-ak integrate korun, ammi precise rupant tem distance bodol sodhunk xoktam jem tea acceleration-ak bodol korunk zata. Mhunnlear data kiteak mhunnlear, v of t equals one point two times t squared meter prati second asa. Zori ammi tem t equals zero second pasun t equals ten seconds-ak integrate kortale (integral from zero to ten of one point two t squared d t), ammi displacement mellounk zata.

unnormalised: Amim ek classic example korunk toyar zanv: x = 1 thavn x = 3 y = x² curve-ache tolle area sodun kaddop. Integration-achea power rule vaprun, ∫x² dx = (x³/3) + C. Atam, ami tem x = 3 ani x = 1 hacher evaluate kortolim, tem amkam (3³/3) - (1³/3) = (27/3) - (1/3) = 26/3. Tor, curve-ache tolle area laginch 8.67 square units asa. Polleat, kitlem kathin na, *hai na*?
normalised: Ek classik example-ak sompork korunk di: curve y equals x squared-achea khalichem zago sodunk x equals one pasun x equals three. Integration-achea power rule vaporun, integral of x squared d x equals (x cubed divided by three) plus C. Atam, ammi tem x equals three ani x equals one-ar evaluate kortam, amkam (three cubed divided by three) minus (one cubed divided by three) equals (twenty seven divided by three) minus (one divided by three) equals twenty six divided by three dita. Mhunn, curve-achea khalichem zago lagbhag eight point six seven square units asa. Polleiat, tem itlem kothin na, hai na?

unnormalised: Tumchea engineering aspirants-ankhatir, integral calculus literally circuit analysis thavn fluid dynamics meren sogllea vostunchem buniyad asa. Ek pool design kortat? Ek chemical reaction optimize kortat? Tumchea ixttanchea integrals-achea ghott bhitar tumi astolim. Space-antle point charges-achea bhomvtonnche electrostatic potential (V) calculate korun pipelines-antle ani udok vrantpachea systems-antle flow rates nixchit korunk, integral calculus ek versa tile upkoronn asa.
normalised: Tumchea soglleam engineering aspirants-ank, integral calculus practical rupant sogllea foundations jexem circuit analysis pasun fluid dynamics-ak asta. Ek bridge design korunk? Ek chemical reaction ut'tom korunk? Tumkam integrals-ant gunthailear zatam, moji ixtta. Space-achea point charges-achea bhonvtonnim electrostatic potential (V) hesap korun pasun pipelines ani water distribution systems-achem flow rates tharaupak, integral calculus ek versatile tool asa.

unnormalised: Tor, thoim tumi asa! Integral calculus-achi ek chodd sankhip ani chodd informal vollokh. Bhitor vochunk bhiyanaakat, tim problems practice korat, ani ugddas dovrat dor ek mathematician, dor ek engineer, dor ek zon jea he vostu vaportat tem tumi atam asat thoim thavn survat keli. Practice korit ravat, ani tumi vevstayik zoxe integrate kortolim. Atam vochat ani thoddi chai piyat ani tim integrals jinkat!
normalised: Mhunn, tumkam tem melltta! Integral calculus-ak ek khub thembo rupan, khub apripann introdushon dila. Bhivonk naka bhitor vochunk, te somossia practice korunk, ani yaad dovrunk ki dor ek ganiticho zanakar, dor ek engineer, dor ek zann hem vostu vaporta toh exactamente tumi atam asa titloch suru kelo. Practice devam dovrat, ani tumi ek pro porim integrate kelea xivai vochonk nat, atam chai piun vochat ani te integrals jitun vochat!
